title: The effect of vaccination on children's physical and cogniti
author: David E Bloom; David Canning; Erica S Shenoy
description: We use data from the Cebu Longitudinal Health and Nutrition Survey (CLHNS) in the Philippines to link vaccination in the first 2 years of life with later physical and cognitive development in childre
